eLabel.text: P L A Y L I S T

widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (30, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 1), size = (40, 28), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 1), size = (60, 28), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (130, 1), size = (120, 28), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (260, 1), size = (220, 28), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (490, 4), size = (90, 28), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showNever"), "notselected": (30, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 1), size = (40, 28), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 1), size = (60, 28), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (130, 1), size = (120, 28), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (260, 1), size = (220, 28), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (490, 4), size = (90, 28), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22), gFont("Regular", 18)], "itemHeight": 30 }

{"template":[ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos=(40,6),size=(48,48),png=0),# index 0 is the isMounted pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos=(210,5),size=(200,28),font=0,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text=1),# index 1 is the sharename MultiContentEntryText(pos=(440,8),size=(260,20),font=1,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text=2),# index 2 is the IPdescription MultiContentEntryText(pos=(210,35),size=(600,20),font=1,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text=3),# index 3 is the DIRdescription MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos=(850,15),size=(48,48),png=4),# index 4 is the activepng pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos=(880,6),size=(48,48),png=5),# index 4 is the mounttype pixmap ], "fonts":[gFont("Regular",22),gFont("Regular",17) ],"itemHeight":60}

screen.name: DialogUpdateDelete
screen.title: AddOnManager
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 50, textsize[1] + 50) offset = 0 offset = 60 wsizex = textsize[0] + 60 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex, 90) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

widget.convert: {"template":[ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(5,5),size=(120,24),flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text=1),# index 0 is the MenuText, MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos=(130,5),size=(25,25),png=2),# index 1 i direction pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos=(160,5),size=(400,24),flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text=3),# index 2 is remote name/number MultiContentEntryText(pos=(580,5),size=(60,24),flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text=4),# index 3 is length of call MultiContentEntryText(pos=(660,5),size=(300,24),flags=RT_HALIGN_CENTER,text=5),# index 4 is my number/name for number ], "fonts":[gFont("Regular",18) ],"itemHeight":29}

{"template":[ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(60,4),size=(700,31),font=0,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_TOP,text=0),# index 0 is the hdd_description MultiContentEntryText(pos=(80,40),size=(680,28),font=1,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_BOTTOM,text=2),# index 2 is the device info MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos=(2,8),size=(55,55),png=7),# index 3 is the device pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos=(58,42),size=(15,16),png=8),# index 4 is the online state pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos=(0,68),size=(820,2),png=9),# index 3 is the div pixmap ], "fonts":[gFont("Regular",28),gFont("Regular",20) ],"itemHeight":70}

screen.name: iDreamAddToDatabase
screen.title: Add music files to iDream database

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 80) offset = 20 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 60 wsizex = textsize[0] + 120 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (600 >wsizex): wsizex = 600 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20, 30 + offset) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, (720-wsizey)/2))

skin.screen:
# fake entry for dynamic thumbnail resizing,currently there is no other way doing this.
{"templates": {"default":(105,[ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos=(10,12),size=(100,75),png=4),# index 4 is the thumbnail MultiContentEntryText(pos=(120,10),size=(820,28),font=0,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text=1),# index 1 is the Title MultiContentEntryText(pos=(120,40),size=(450,25),font=1,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text=5),# index 5 is the Published Date MultiContentEntryText(pos=(120,70),size=(450,25),font=1,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text=6),# index 6 is the Views Count MultiContentEntryText(pos=(590,40),size=(360,25),font=1,flags=RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text=7),# index 7 is the duration MultiContentEntryText(pos=(590,70),size=(360,25),font=1,flags=RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text=8),# index 8 is the ratingcount ]), "state":(105,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(10,10),size=(950,28),font=2,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text=0),# index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos=(10,40),size=(950,50),font=3,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text=1),# index 2 is the description ]) }, "fonts":[gFont("Regular",22),gFont("Regular",19),gFont("Regular",26),gFont("Regular",20) ],"itemHeight":105}
